author: mturk
msg: First try the reverse proxies. If there is no worker defined for
requested uri use the forward worker, but only for PROXYREQ_PROXY

author: mturk
msg: disables puting the entire worker in retry mode, cause
for forward workers the remote is not fixed.

author: mturk
msg: Add sockaddr to proxy_conn_rec. Using the workers address
is unsafe for forward proxy workers, cause unlike reverse
proxies the forward can have each connection with different

author: mturk
msg: Use forward worker for all PROXYREQ_PROXY requests.
